channel.title: Improving output of whonixcheck when aborted due to signal
channel.description:
[quote="Patrick, post:3, topic:1173"][quote author=Nnamen link=topic=1357.msg8705#msg8705 date=1435313029] More errors: WARNING: whonixcheck aborted! (SIGNAL_TYPE:SIGTERM) [/quote] Expected when you press cancel.[/quote]
Maybe I'm being too picky here, but while warnings aren't supposed to tell the user that something goes very wrong, that red color is scary, Red is the color of errors. Perhaps the color of warnings should be yellow?

item.title: Improving output of whonixcheck when aborted due to signal
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Made the aborted message a usual green “INFO:” message. Does that sound alright?

Read full topic
item.source: Improving output of whonixcheck when aborted due to signal

item.title: Improving output of whonixcheck when aborted due to signal
item.dc:creator: Nnamen
item.description:
This is a good observation. I mean, I’m by no means a novice in the cyber world
but I definitely got spooked enough to not read closely and realise that it was just
a warning and not an error.

Read full topic
item.source: Improving output of whonixcheck when aborted due to signal

item.title: Improving output of whonixcheck when aborted due to signal
item.dc:creator: Greenwhonix
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:3, topic:1173”][quote author=Nnamen link=topic=1357.msg8705#msg8705 date=1435313029]
More errors:
WARNING: whonixcheck aborted! (SIGNAL_TYPE:SIGTERM)
[/quote]
Expected when you press cancel.[/quote]

Maybe I’m being too picky here, but while warnings aren’t supposed to tell the user that something goes very wrong, that red color is scary, Red is the color of errors. Perhaps the color of warnings should be yellow?

Read full topic
item.source: Improving output of whonixcheck when aborted due to signal
